{"id":708510387,"lang":"java","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1653677201,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/708510387/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Three Consecutive Integers That Sum to a Given Number","memory":"40.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] sumOfThree(long num) {\n        long[] ans = new long[3];\n        long p = num/3;\n        if ( num  == 3L* (long)p){\n            ans[0] = p -1L;\n            ans[1] = p;\n            ans[2] = p+ 1L;\n            return ans;\n        }\n        else{\n            return new long[0];\n        }\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-three-consecutive-integers-that-sum-to-a-given-number"}
